original_title: Umezu Kazuo: Kyôfu gekijô - Death make
overview: Five people visit an abandoned building where five girls disappeared ten years ago when they tried to summon ghosts. These five people who visit the building has met on a website for people with supernatural powers. With their abilities realize these people that they should leave the building as quickly as possible, the problem is that all doors are suddenly gone.
title: Kazuo Umezu's Horror Theater: Death Make
